snippet: Registrations of new passengers cars, a proxy for sales, rose 1.4 percent from November 2013, with manufacturers’ incentives helping to offset weakness in France and Germany.
abstract: European Automobile Manufacturers' Association reports European car sales rose 1.4 percent from year earlier to total of 11.6 million units for first eleven months of 2014; sales continue to be weak in France and Germany.

byline.original: By LAURE FOURQUET and DAVID JOLLY

lead_paragraph: Registrations of new passengers cars, a proxy for sales, rose 1.4 percent from November 2013, with manufacturers’ incentives helping to offset weakness in France and Germany.

headline.main: Auto Sales Inch Higher in Europe
headline.print_headline: European Auto Sales Rise for 15th Consecutive Month
